couple.title: About us
couple.bride: a practical and resilient woman who always strives to do my best in work and life. Although I may seem calm on the outside, I carry a determined spirit within and am always moving forward, no matter the challenges.
couple.groom: a man full of energy, always passionate about work and life. I live optimistically, enjoy exploring new things, and am always ready to embrace challenges

theDate.title: The Big Day
theDate.body: We are so happy to see and welcome you on our wedding day. We are truly grateful and delighted for your presence and heartfelt wishes. Thank you so much!

wedding.brideAddress: 346, Trung hamlet, Tan Quoi, Thanh Binh, Dong Thap
wedding.groomAdress: 1178, Tan Thanh hamlet, Tan Long, Thanh Binh, Dong Thap
